Adrenaline.card_desc: [Armor] Reduce your active Cooldowns by {scale=10|10}% after getting an Elimination.

Chop Down.card_desc: [Crippling Throw] Reduce the Cooldown of Crippling Throw by {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Chopper.card_desc: [Crippling Throw] Heal for {scale=100|100} after hitting an enemy with Crippling Throw.

Deep Roots.card_desc: [Crippling Throw] Crippling Throw will Root enemies hit and will Chain between nearby enemies up to 5 times.

Fatalis.card_desc: [Crippling Throw] Hitting an enemy with Crippling Throw reduces the Cooldown of Blossom by {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Ferocity.card_desc: [Weapon] Increase your maximum damage scaling over distance by 60%.

Force of Nature.card_desc: [Armor] Gain a {scale=150|150}-Health Shield for 3s after dropping to or below 50% Health.

Gentle Breeze.card_desc: [Blossom] Increase your allies' Movement Speed by {scale=5|5}% for 4s after they are Healed by Blossom.

Heavenly Agility.card_desc: [Vine] Gain a {scale=100|100} Shield for 3s after using Vine.

Nature's Quickness.card_desc: [Vine] Increase your Movement Speed by {scale=8|8}% for 2s after using Vine.

Overgrowth.card_desc: [Vine] Reset the Cooldown of Vine after dropping to or below {scale=15|15}% Health.

Perennial.card_desc: [Blossom] Reduce the Cooldown of Blossom by {scale=0.4|0.4}s.

Pick Up.card_desc: [Crippling Throw] Reduce the Cooldown of Vine by {scale=1|1}s after hitting an enemy with Crippling Throw.

Rampant Blooming.card_desc: [Blossom] Allies Healed by Blossom will Heal for an additional 300 over 3s.

Rebound.card_desc: [Armor] Increase your Healing received by {scale=5|5}% while at or below 50% Health.

Unstoppable.card_desc: [Blossom] Reduce your damage taken by {scale=6|6}% for 4s after using Blossom.

Verdant Expanse.card_desc: [Blossom] Increase the radius of Blossom by {scale=4|4}%.

Vine Grasp.card_desc: [Vine] Increase the range of Vine by {scale=10|10}%.

Adrenalin.card_desc: [Rüstung] Eliminierungen reduzieren alle aktiven Abklingzeiten um {scale=10|10}%.

Brutalit\u00e4t.card_desc: [Waffe] Erhöht die maximale Schadenserhöhung auf Distanz um 60%.

Eile der Natur.card_desc: [Weinrebe] Erhöht dein Lauftempo nach Aktivierung von Weinrebe 2s lang um {scale=8|8}%.

Erholung.card_desc: [Rüstung] Bei 50% oder weniger Gesundheit erhältst du um {scale=5|5}% erhöhte Heilung.

Fatalis.card_desc: [Lähmungswurf] Treffer mit Lähmungswurf reduzieren die Abklingzeit von Blüte um {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Gr\u00fcnfl\u00e4che.card_desc: [Blüte] Erhöht den Radius von Blüte um {scale=4|4}%.

Hacker.card_desc: [Lähmungswurf] Triffst du einen Gegner mit Lähmungswurf, wirst du {scale=100|100} LP geheilt.

Himmlischer Schwung.card_desc: [Weinrebe] Nach Verwendung von Weinrebe erhältst du 3s lang einen Schild mit {scale=100|100} LP.

Immerw\u00e4hrend.card_desc: [Blüte] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Blüte um {scale=0.4|0.4}s.

Nachschlag.card_desc: [Lähmungswurf] Treffer mit Lähmungswurf reduzieren die Abklingzeit von Weinrebe um {scale=1|1}s.

Naturgewalt.card_desc: [Rüstung] Fällst du auf oder unter 50% Gesundheit, erhältst du 3s lang einen Schild mit {scale=150|150} LP.

Rebenklammer.card_desc: [Weinrebe] Erhöht die Reichweite von Weinrebe um {scale=10|10}%.

Rindenhaut.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht deine maximale Gesundheit um {scale=75|75} LP.

Sanfte Brise.card_desc: [Blüte] Erhöht das Lauftempo von Verbündeten 4s lang um {scale=5|5}%, nachdem sie mit Blüte geheilt wurden.

Spalten.card_desc: [Lähmungswurf] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Lähmungswurf um {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Tiefe Wurzeln.card_desc: [Lähmungswurf] Lähmungswurf verwurzelt getroffene Gegner und springt bis zu 5-mal zwischen nahen Gegnern hin und her.

\u00dcberwucherung.card_desc: [Weinrebe] Fällst du auf oder unter {scale=15|15}% deiner maximalen Gesundheit, wird die Abklingzeit von Weinrebe zurückgesetzt.

Unaufhaltbar.card_desc: [Blüte] Nach Verwendung von Blüte wird erlittener Schaden 4s lang um {scale=6|6}% reduziert.

Wucherblume.card_desc: [Blüte] Mit Blüte geheilte Verbündete werden über 3s 300 LP zusätzlich geheilt.

Abattre.card_desc: [Lancer handicap.] Lancer handicapant se recharge {scale=0.6|0.6}s plus vite.

Adr\u00e9naline.card_desc: [Armure] Chaque élimination réduit les temps de recharge en cours de {scale=10|10}%.

Agilit\u00e9 c\u00e9leste.card_desc: [Liane] Liane génère un bouclier de {scale=100|100} PV qui dure 3s.

Couperet.card_desc: [Lancer handicap.] Toucher un ennemi avec Lancer handicapant vous rend {scale=100|100} PV.

Douce brise.card_desc: [Fleur] Fleur augmente la vitesse des cibles de {scale=5|5}% pendant 4s.

\u00c9tendue verdoyante.card_desc: [Fleur] Le rayon de Fleur augmente de {scale=4|4}%.

Extension.card_desc: [Liane] La portée de Liane augmente de {scale=10|10}%.

Fatalis.card_desc: [Lancer handicap.] Toucher un ennemi avec Lancer handicapant réduit le temps de recharge de Fleur de {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

F\u00e9rocit\u00e9.card_desc: [Arme] Vos dégâts augmentent de 60% de plus avec la distance.

Floraison rapide.card_desc: [Fleur] Activer Fleur rend 300 PV de plus en 3s aux alliés atteints.

Force de la nature.card_desc: [Armure] Passer sous 50% de santé donne un bouclier de {scale=150|150} PV pendant 3s.

Irr\u00e9pressible.card_desc: [Fleur] Pendant 4s après Fleur, vous subissez {scale=6|6}% de dégâts en moins.

Racines profondes.card_desc: [Lancer handicap.] Lancer handicapant applique un enracinement de 1s et rebondit entre les ennemis 5 fois.

Reprise.card_desc: [Lancer handicap.] Toucher un ennemi avec Lancer handicapant réduit le temps de recharge de Liane de {scale=1|1}s.

R\u00e9tablissement.card_desc: [Armure] En dessous de 50% de PV, vous recevez {scale=5|5}% de soins en plus.

Surcroissance.card_desc: [Liane ] Passer en dessous de {scale=15|15}% de PV réinitialise le temps de recharge de Liane.

V\u00e9locit\u00e9 naturelle.card_desc: [Liane] Pendant 2s après Liane, votre vitesse augmente de {scale=8|8}%.

\u5207\u8089\u65a7.card_desc: [致残投掷] 致残投掷命中时会使你获得{scale=50|50}点治疗

\u52bf\u4e0d\u53ef\u6321.card_desc: [绽放] 使用绽放后4秒内,获得{scale=6|6}%的伤害减免

\u56db\u5b63\u5e38\u9752.card_desc: [绽放] 降低绽放的冷却时间{scale=0.5|0.5}秒

\u5929\u8d50\u654f\u6377.card_desc: [蔓藤] 藤蔓的拉进速度提高{scale=6|6}%

\u5bbf\u547d.card_desc: [致残投掷] 致残投掷命中敌人将使你的移动速度提升{scale=10|10}%，持续2秒

\u5f3a\u5316\u6811\u76ae.card_desc: [护甲] 使你的生命值上限增加{scale=75|75}

\u5fae\u98ce.card_desc: [绽放] 受到绽放技能治疗的友军会在4秒内获得{scale=8|8}%的移动速度加成

\u679d\u7e41\u53f6\u8302.card_desc: [藤蔓] 生命值低于{scale=15|15}%时藤蔓的冷却时间降低100%

\u6839\u6df1\u8482\u56fa.card_desc: [致残投掷] 致残投掷现在会附带定身效果，且造成伤害提高10%

\u6b8b\u66b4\u98de\u65a7.card_desc: [武器] 远距离伤害加成提高60%

\u751f\u751f\u4e0d\u606f.card_desc: [绽放] 使用绽放治疗友军时，会额外为其每秒回复160点生命值，持续4秒

\u7535\u5149\u706b\u77f3.card_desc: [致残投掷] 致残投掷命中敌人会使藤蔓的冷却时间降低{scale=1|1}秒

\u7eff\u610f\u76ce\u7136.card_desc: [绽放] 增加绽放的有效范围{scale=10|10}%

\u80be\u4e0a\u817a\u7d20.card_desc: [护甲] 击败敌方可以使所有技能的冷却时间降低{scale=10|10}%

\u81ea\u7136\u4e4b\u529b.card_desc: [护甲] 你的移动速度无法被降至{scale=60|10}%以下

\u81ea\u7136\u4e4b\u901f.card_desc: [蔓藤] 使用藤蔓后提高{scale=8|8}%的移动速度，持续2秒

\u91cd\u6574\u65d7\u9f13.card_desc: [护甲] 生命值低于50%时受到的治疗效果提高{scale=5|5}%

\u91ce\u86ee\u5288\u780d.card_desc: [致残投掷] 减少致残投掷的冷却时间{scale=0.6|0.6}秒

Adrenaline.card_desc: [Armor] Health drops grant you 30% Movement Speed for 2s.

Bark Skin.card_desc: [Briars & Blossoms][+3 Per Rank] While on Blossoms, you reduce all hits you take by {6/9/12/15}

Chopper.card_desc: [Axe Throw] Your axe throw heals you for 10% of the damage dealt.

Fatalis.card_desc: [Weapon] Gain 15% Movement Speed for 1s on successful weapon hit. Does not stack.

Forest Expansion.card_desc: [Vine] You may activate Vine once more for 2s after using it.

Harvest.card_desc: [Weapon] Hitting an enemy with your weapon spawns a HP Drop that heals for 50.

Heavenly Agility.card_desc: [Nature's Demise] When you activate Nature's Demise all allies within 55 units gain 15% movespeed and 25% increased healing.

Journey.card_desc: [Armor] Regenerate 120 Health per second while mounted.

Nature's Quickness.card_desc: [Briars & Blossoms] When changing to Blossoms, those affected gain 25% Movement Speed for 1s.

Over Growth.card_desc: [Briars & Blossoms] Increase amount healed by 3 per second.

Pick Up.card_desc: [Axe Throw] Axe Throw deals 100 more damage. Hitting a target with your weapon within 5s of them being struck with Axe Throw lowers the Cooldown of Axe Throw by {2}s.

Rebound.card_desc: [Armor] Consuming a Health Drop reduces all Cooldowns by 25%

Unstoppable.card_desc: [Nature's Demise] During nature's demise you gain 20% Crowd Control Reduction.

Vine Grasp.card_desc: [Vine] Hitting a target directly with Vine slows them for 10% for 2s.

Adrenalina.card_desc: [Armadura] Tus recargas activas se reducen un {scale=10|10}% tras conseguir una eliminación.

Agilidad celestial.card_desc: [Enredadera] Ganas un escudo de {scale=100|100} PS durante 3s tras usar Enredadera.

Brisa suave.card_desc: [Flores] Los aliados aumentan su velocidad de movimiento un {scale=5|5}% durante 4s tras ser curados por Flores.

Celeridad de la naturaleza.card_desc: [Enredadera] Tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta un {scale=8|8}% durante 2s después de usar Enredadera

Expansi\u00f3n boscosa.card_desc: [Flores] Aumenta el radio de Flores un {scale=4|4}%.

Fatalis.card_desc: [Tiro lesionador] Al alcanzar a un enemigo con Tiro lesionador, reduces la recarga de Flores en {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Ferocidad.card_desc: [Arma] Aumenta la escala máxima de daño por distancia un 60%.

Floraci\u00f3n incontrolable.card_desc: [Flores] Los aliados curados por Flores recibirán 300 PS adicionales durante 3s.

Fuerza natural.card_desc: [Armadura] Consigues un escudo con {scale=150|150} PS durante 3s cuando tu salud baja al 50% o menos.

Garras de enredadera.card_desc: [Enredadera] El alcance de Enredadera aumenta un {scale=10|10}%.

Imparable.card_desc: [Flores] Se reduce el daño recibido un {scale=6|6}% durante 4s después de usar Flores.

Perenne.card_desc: [Flores] Se reduce la recarga de Flores en {scale=0.4|0.4}s.

Piel de corteza.card_desc: [Armadura] Tu salud máxima aumenta en {scale=75|75} PS.

Ra\u00edces profundas.card_desc: [Tiro lesionador] Tiro lesionador enraíza a los enemigos alcanzados y los encadena a los enemigos cercanos hasta 5 veces.

Recoger.card_desc: [Tiro lesionador] Se reduce la recarga de Enredadera por {scale=1|1}s tras alcanzar a un enemigo con Tiro lesionador.

Recuperaci\u00f3n.card_desc: [Armadura] La curación que recibes aumenta un {scale=5|5}% si tienes un 50% o menos de salud.

Sobrecrecimiento.card_desc: [Enredadera] Reduces la recarga de Enredadera cuando tu salud baja al {scale=15|15}% o menos.

Tajadera.card_desc: [Tiro lesionador] Te curas {scale=100|100} PS tras alcanzar a un enemigo con Tiro lesionador.

Tala.card_desc: [Tiro lesionador] Se reduce la recarga de Tiro lesionador en {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Adrenalina.card_desc: [Armadura] Reduz em {scale=10|10}% seus intervalos ativos ao conseguir uma eliminação.

Adubado.card_desc: [Cipó] Zera o intervalo do Cipó ao chegar a {scale=15|15}% ou menos de vida máxima.

Aperto do Cip\u00f3.card_desc: [Cipó] Aumenta o alcance do Cipó em {scale=10|10}%.

Brisa Suave.card_desc: [Primavera] Aumenta a velocidade de movimento dos aliados em {scale=5|5}% por 4s após eles serem curados pela Primavera.

Casca Grossa.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta em {scale=75|75} a sua vida máxima.

Expans\u00e3o Verde.card_desc: [Primavera] Aumenta em {scale=4|4}% o raio de alcance de Primavera.

Fatalis.card_desc: [Arremesso Especial] Acertar um inimigo com o Arremesso Especial reduz o intervalo da Primavera em {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Ferocidade.card_desc: [Arma] Aumenta o dano máximo, escalonado pela distância, em 60%.

For\u00e7a da Natureza.card_desc: [Armadura] Ganha um escudo de {scale=150|150} de vida por 3s ao chegar a 50% ou menos da sua vida.

Impar\u00e1vel.card_desc: [Primavera] Reduz o dano recebido em {scale=6|6}% por 4s após usar Primavera.

Mutilador.card_desc: [Arremesso Especial] Você se cura em {scale=100|100} após acertar um inimigo com o Arremesso Especial.

Naturalmente \u00c1gil.card_desc: [Cipó] Ganha um escudo de {scale=100|100} de vida por 3s após usar o Cipó.

Pancada.card_desc: [Arremesso Especial] Reduz o intervalo do Cipó em {scale=1|1}s após acertar um inimigo com o Arremesso Especial.

Perene.card_desc: [Primavera] Reduz o intervalo de Primavera em {scale=0.4|0.4}s.

Poda R\u00e1pida.card_desc: [Arremesso Especial] Reduz o intervalo do Arremesso Especial em {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Primavera Potente.card_desc: [Primavera] Aliados curados pela Primavera receberão uma cura adicional de 300 no decorrer de 3s.

Ra\u00edzes Fundas.card_desc: [Arremesso Especial] O Arremesso Especial enraizará os inimigos atingidos e vai ricochetear entre inimigos próximos até 5 vezes.

R\u00e1pido por Natureza.card_desc: [Cipó] Aumenta em {scale=8|8}% sua velocidade de movimento por 2s após usar o Cipó.

Vi\u00e7oso.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta em {scale=5|5}% a cura recebida enquanto estiver com menos de 50% de vida.

\u0410\u0434\u0440\u0435\u043d\u0430\u04.card_desc: [Броня] Устранения сокращают текущую перезарядку способностей на {scale=10|10}%.

\u0411\u043e\u0436\u0435\u0441\u0442\u04.card_desc: [Лоза] После использования Лозы вы получаете щит прочностью {scale=100|100} ед. на 3 с.

\u0411\u0443\u0440\u043d\u043e\u0435 \u0.card_desc: [Цветок] Исцеленные Цветком союзники исцеляются еще на 300 ед. в течение 3 с.

\u0412\u044b\u0440\u0443\u0431\u043a\u04.card_desc: [Парализующий бросок] Перезарядка Парализующего броска сокращается на {scale=0.6|0.6} с.

\u0413\u043b\u0443\u0431\u043e\u043a\u04.card_desc: [Парализующий бросок] Парализующий бросок обездвиживает пораженных врагов и отскакивает к находящимся рядом врагам до 5 раз.

\u0414\u0443\u0431\u043e\u0432\u0430\u04.card_desc: [Броня] Ваше максимальное здоровье повышается на {scale=75|75} ед.

\u0417\u0430\u0440\u043e\u0441\u043b\u04.card_desc: [Лоза] Лоза сразу перезаряжается при уровне здоровья {scale=15|15}% или ниже.

\u041b\u0435\u0433\u043a\u0438\u0439 \u0.card_desc: [Цветок] После исцеления Цветком скорость передвижения союзников повышается на {scale=5|5}% на 4 с.

\u041c\u044f\u0441\u043e\u0440\u0443\u04.card_desc: [Парализующий бросок] Попадание по врагу Парализующим броском исцеляет вас на {scale=100|100} ед.

\u041d\u0430 \u043b\u0435\u0442\u0443.card_desc: [Парализующий бросок] Попадание по врагу Парализующим броском сокращает перезарядку Лозы на {scale=1|1} с.

\u041d\u0435\u0443\u0434\u0435\u0440\u04.card_desc: [Цветок] После использования Цветка ваш входящий урон снижается на {scale=6|6}% на 4 с.

\u041e\u0442\u0434\u0430\u0447\u0430.card_desc: [Броня] При уровне здоровья 50% и ниже вы получаете на {scale=5|5}% больше исцеления.

\u041f\u0440\u0438\u0440\u043e\u0434\u04.card_desc: [Лоза] После использования Лозы ваша скорость передвижения повышается на {scale=8|8}% на 2 с.

\u0421\u0432\u0438\u0440\u0435\u043f\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Изменение максимального урона от расстояния повышается на 60%.

\u0421\u0438\u043b\u0430 \u043f\u0440\u0.card_desc: [Броня] При уровне здоровья 50% и ниже вы получаете щит прочностью {scale=150|150} ед. на 3 с.

\u0424\u0430\u0442\u0430\u043b\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Парализующий бросок] Попадание по врагу Парализующим броском сокращает перезарядку Цветка на {scale=0.6|0.6} с.

Adrenalina.card_desc: [Pancerz] Eliminacje skracają aktywne czasy odnowienia o {scale=10|10}%.

Bujne kwitnienie.card_desc: [Rozkwit] Sojusznikom trafionym Rozkwitem przywraca dodatkowe 300 PZ w ciągu 3 s.

Fatalis.card_desc: [Okaleczający rzut] Trafienie Okaleczającym rzutem redukuje czas odnowienia Rozkwitu o {scale=0.6|0.6} s.

G\u0142\u0119bokie korzenie.card_desc: [Okaleczający rzut] Okaleczający rzut zakorzenia trafionych wrogów i przeskakuje na pobliskich wrogów maks. 5 razy.

\u0141agodna bryza.card_desc: [Rozkwit] Zwiększa szybkość ruchu sojuszników o {scale=5|5}% na 4 s po uleczeniu ich przez Rozkwit.

Niebia\u0144ska zr\u0119czno\u015b\u0107.card_desc: [Winorośl] Zapewnia ci tarczę o odporności {scale=100|100} pkt. na 3 s po użyciu Winorośli.

Niepowstrzymany.card_desc: [Rozkwit] Zapewnia {scale=6|6}% redukcji obrażeń na 4 s po użyciu Rozkwitu.

Podniesienie.card_desc: [Okaleczający rzut] Trafienie wroga Okaleczającym rzutem skraca czas odnowienia Winorośli o {scale=1|1} s.

Rykoszet.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zapewnia wzrost leczenia o {scale=5|5}%, gdy twój poziom zdrowia nie przekracza 50%.

Siekanka.card_desc: [Okaleczający rzut] Redukuje odnowienie Okaleczającego rzutu o {scale=0.6|0.6} s.

Si\u0142a natury.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zapewnia tarczę o {scale=150|150} pkt. odporności na 3 s po tym, jak twoje zdrowie spadnie poniżej 50%.

Szybko\u015b\u0107 natury.card_desc: [Winorośl] Zwiększa szybkość ruchu o {scale=8|8}% na 2 s po użyciu Winorośli.

Tasak.card_desc: [Okaleczający rzut] Trafienie wroga Okaleczającym rzutem przywraca ci {scale=100|100} PZ.

Trwa\u0142o\u015b\u0107.card_desc: [Rozkwit] Skraca czas odnowienia Rozkwitu o {scale=0.4|0.4} s.

Twarda kora.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa twoje maks. zdrowie o {scale=75|75} PZ.

Zaciek\u0142o\u015b\u0107.card_desc: [Broń] Zwiększa skalowanie maks. obrażeń na podstawie odległości o 60%.

Zaro\u015bni\u0119cie.card_desc: [Winorośl] Resetuje czas odnowienia Winorośli po tym, jak twoje zdrowie spadnie do poziomu {scale=15|15}% PZ lub poniżej.

Adrenalin.card_desc: [Zırh] Bir Saf Dışı Bırakma yaptıktan sonra aktif Bekleme Sürelerini %{scale=10|10} azalt.

A\u015f\u0131r\u0131 B\u00fcy\u00fcme.card_desc: [Sarmaşık] %{scale=15|15} Can veya altında iken Sarmaşık'ın Bekleme Süresini sıfırla.

Co\u015fkun Filizlenme.card_desc: [Çiçek Aç] Çiçek Aç ile İyileştirilen müttefikler 3 saniyede ek 300 Can daha İyileşir.

Derin K\u00f6kler.card_desc: [Felç Edici Atış] Felç Edici Atış vurduğu düşmanları Yere Çakar ve yakındaki düşmanlar arasında 5 defaya kadar Zincirlenebilir.

Do\u011fa H\u0131z\u0131.card_desc: [Sarmaşık] Sarmaşık kullandıktan sonra 2sn boyunca %{scale=8|8} Hareket Hızı kazan.

Do\u011fal Afet.card_desc: [Zırh] Canın %50 ya da altına düşerse 3sn boyunca {scale=150|150} Canlık bir Kalkan kazan.

Durdurulamaz.card_desc: [Çiçek Aç] Çiçek Aç'ı kullandıktan sonra aldığın hasarı 4sn boyunca %{scale=6|6} azalt.

Fatalis.card_desc: [Felç Edici Atış] Bir düşmanı Felç Edici Atışla vurmak, Çiçek Aç'ın Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.6|0.6}sn azaltır.

Hafif Meltem.card_desc: [Çiçek Aç] Çiçek Aç ile iyileştirilen Müttefikler 4sn boyunca %{scale=5|5} Hareket Hızı kazanır.

Kesip Bi\u00e7me.card_desc: [Felç Edici Atış] Felç Edici Atış'ın Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.6|0.6}sn azalt.

K\u0131y\u0131m.card_desc: [Felç Edici Atış] Felç Edici Atış ile bir düşmanı vurduktan sonra {scale=100|100} Can iyileş.

Kutsal \u00c7eviklik.card_desc: [Sarmaşık] Sarmaşık kullandıktan sonra 3sn boyunca {scale=100|100} Canlık bir kalkan kazan.

Toparlama.card_desc: [Felç Edici Atış] Felç Edici Atış ile bir düşmanı vurduktan sonra Sarmaşık'ın Bekleme Süresi {scale=1|1}sn azalır.

Uzun \u00d6m\u00fcrl\u00fc.card_desc: [Çiçek Aç] Çiçek Aç'ın Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.4|0.4}sn azalt.

Vah\u015fet.card_desc: [Silah] Mesafe kaydettikçe maksimum hasar ölçeklendirmeni %60 artır.

Ye\u015fil Alan.card_desc: [Çiçek Aç] Çiçek Aç'ın etki alanını %{scale=4|4} artır.
